source.name: geo_meta
source.description: Get list of GEO GDS PCL files with Homo sapiens in the organisms meta-data field.

stage.name: remove_overlapping
stage.arguments: execute_per_file 16 4096 java -Xmx2048m -classpath TROILKATT.CLASSPATH edu.princeton.function.troilkatt.sge.PclRemoveOverlap TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE_NOEXT TROILKATT.GLOBALMETA_DIR/geo-gds.excluded > TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE_NOEXT.out 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.error

stage.name: missing_values
stage.description: Fill in missing values and set some values that are better characterized as missing.

stage.name: log_transform
stage.description: Log transform datasets that have not already been log transformed.

stage.name: knnimpute
stage.arguments: execute_per_file TROILKATT.BIN/KNNImputer -i TROILKATT.INPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE -o TROILKATT.OUTPUT_DIR/TROILKATT.FILE.knn -k 10 -m 0.7 -d euclidean > TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/KNNImputer.out 2> TROILKATT.LOG_DIR/KNNImputer.error
stage.description: Fill in missing values with their most likely values.

stage.name: map_genes
stage.description: Translate all gene names to a common standard

sink.name: geo_gds_pcl_sink
sink.description: There is no sink for the final PCL files.
